subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Going into the playoff for the Nextel Cup, Clint Bowyer could have been voted least likely among the top 12 drivers to have his name on the list of contenders.
snippet: Going into the playoff for the Nextel Cup, Clint Bowyer could have been voted least likely among the top 12 drivers to have his name on the list of contenders.
